channel.title: Question regarding sponsored server application
channel.description: Always when I post my application for my server it tells me to wait atleast 24-48 hours, idk why but it always seems to take longer than 48 hours to get accepted. Last year I got accepted 3 months in a row and the 4th month I didn't get accepted nor did I get declined for some weird reason. Five days have past since i should have gotten accepted/declined and it still says I need to wait, could someone please explain why this is happening or can someone of the staff help me out? Thanks in advance.

item.title: Question regarding sponsored server application
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ve gone ahead and processed all of the applications that were posted.

Read full topic
